data.title: Vanessa Marcil
data.text:
AKA Sally Vanessa Ortiz

Born: 15-Oct-1968

Birthplace: Indio, CA

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Gina Kinkaid on Beverly Hills 90210

Father: Peter Ortiz (contractor)

Mother: Patricia Marcil (herbalist)

Sister: Tina

Sister: Sherry

Brother: Sam

Husband: Corey Feldman (m. 6-Aug-1989, div. 1993)

Boyfriend: Tyler Christopher (broken engagement)

Boyfriend: Brian Austin Green (actor, dated until 2003, one son)

Son: Kassius Lijah Marcil-Green (b. 30-Mar-2002)

Boyfriend: Ben Younger (screenwriter)

Husband: Carmine Giovinazzo (actor, m. 11-Jul-2010)

University: College of the Desert, Palm Desert, CA

Mexican Ancestry

French Ancestry

Italian Ancestry

Portuguese Ancestry

Risk Factors: Vegetarian, Agoraphobia

TELEVISION

Lipstick Jungle Josie Scotto (2008)

Las Vegas Sam Marquez (2003-08)

Beverly Hills, 90210 Gina Kinkaid (1998-2000)

General Hospital Brenda Barrett (1992-2003 and 2010-11)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

One Hot Summer (26-Jul-2009)

Code Hunter (1-May-2002)
